name: Pokoje: another Backroom
description:
Pokoje: another backroom was just an idea I've had for a while. I would love this game to become more of a simulator.

Controls:
WASD - movement
Q - Toggle Phone
Right Mouse - Toggle Browser
F - Toggle Flaslight
Left Mouse - Quick Time Events

It's still a little buggy, so take it easy. Also there might be some JUMPSCARES =)

Hope you enjoy it

Created by: Jakob Reborn (game design, scripting, level design, testing, 3d modelling etc.)
